intro.title: Why HearMe? Because mental health support in India should be simple, private, and in your language
intro.p1: Exam stress keeping you up at night? Job pressure crushing you? Family expectations weighing heavy? Feeling lonely in a crowded city? Breakup pain? Money worries? We get it. Life in India is intense. And sometimes, you just need someone to listen ‚Äî without advice, without judgment, without telling your family.
intro.p2: HearMe offers FREE AI emotional support 24/7 in Hindi & English. No therapist appointments. No expensive sessions. Just open the chat, speak your heart, and feel lighter. Our AI is trained on Indian emotions, understands 'ghar ki baat,' and responds with warmth and care.
intro.p3: Need to talk to a real human? We also offer paid counseling sessions with trained professionals. Call +91 8105568665 (Mon-Fri, 10 AM - 6 PM IST) or email rghvndr99@gmail.com to book a session.

trust.title: Your Safety & Privacy ‚Äî Our Promise
trust.p1: We know trust is everything. That's why HearMe is built with military-grade encryption, zero data tracking, and complete anonymity. Your conversations never leave our secure servers. We don't store personal details. We don't sell data. We don't judge. This is your safe space ‚Äî protected, private, and sacred.
trust.p2: Important: HearMe is emotional support, not emergency medical care. If you're in immediate danger, feeling suicidal, or facing a medical emergency, please call 112 (India Emergency) or contact AASRA (9820466726), Vandrevala Foundation (9999666555), or iCall (9152987821). Your life is precious. Please reach out for urgent help when needed.

voicemate.heroTitle: Apni Awaaz, Apne Shabdon Mein ‚Äî Your Voice, Your Words, Forever
voicemate.heroSub: When you can't be there in person, let your voice be. Create your AI VoiceTwin in 60 seconds ‚Äî send bedtime stories to your kids, comfort to your parents, or warmth to loved ones across miles. In Hindi, English, or any Indian language. Free forever.
voicemate.emotionalTitle: Why VoiceTwin? Because some voices should never fade away
voicemate.emotionalSubtitle: In India, a mother's lullaby, a father's advice, a grandparent's story ‚Äî these aren't just sounds. They're home. They're love. They're who we are.
voicemate.useCase1Title: Maa ki lori, chahe aap office mein ho
voicemate.useCase1Subtitle: Mother's lullaby, even when you're at the office
voicemate.useCase1Desc: Stuck in a late-night meeting? Your child still hears your voice singing their favorite lullaby. Record once, send anytime. Your warmth, your tone, your love ‚Äî even when you can't be there.
voicemate.useCase2Title: Ghar ki awaaz, videsh se bhi
voicemate.useCase2Subtitle: Voice of home, even from abroad
voicemate.useCase2Desc: Living in the US, UK, or Canada? Your parents in India can hear your voice every day ‚Äî not a robotic text-to-speech, but YOU. Wish them good morning, remind them to take medicine, or just say 'I love you' in your own voice.
voicemate.useCase3Title: Preserve the voices you never want to lose
voicemate.useCase3Desc: Record your grandmother's stories. Your father's advice. Your mother's prayers. VoiceTwin preserves these precious voices forever ‚Äî so future generations can hear the love that shaped your family.
voicemate.howItWorksTitle: Create Your VoiceTwin in 3 Simple Steps
voicemate.step1Desc: Record directly on your phone or upload an audio file. Speak naturally in Hindi, English, Hinglish, or any Indian language. No studio needed ‚Äî your bedroom, kitchen, or car works perfectly.
voicemate.step2Title: AI learns your voice in 60 seconds
voicemate.step2Desc: Our AI (powered by ElevenLabs) analyzes your tone, pitch, emotion, and accent. It creates a digital twin that sounds exactly like you ‚Äî not robotic, but warm and human.
voicemate.step3Title: Send voice messages that sound like YOU
voicemate.step3Desc: Type any message in HearMe chat, and it speaks in YOUR voice. Send to family, friends, or use for emotional support. Your voice, your words, your connection.
voicemate.trustTitle: Your Voice, Your Privacy ‚Äî Sacred and Secure
voicemate.trust1Desc: Your voice sample is encrypted end-to-end. We use the same security standards as banks and hospitals. Your voice never leaves our secure servers.
voicemate.trust2Desc: Your voice is yours. We don't sell it to advertisers, train other AI models, or share it with third parties. Ever.
voicemate.trust3Desc: You own your VoiceTwin. Rename it, delete it, or create new ones ‚Äî you're in complete control. No hidden fees, no lock-in.
voicemate.trust4Title: Built for India, respects Indian values
voicemate.trust4Desc: We understand Indian family dynamics, privacy concerns, and cultural sensitivity. Your data is handled with the respect it deserves.
voicemate.benefitsTitle: Why Thousands of Indians Trust VoiceTwin
voicemate.benefit1Desc: Unlike Google Translate or Siri, VoiceTwin captures YOUR unique voice ‚Äî your accent, your warmth, your emotion. It's not AI pretending to be you. It IS you.
voicemate.benefit2Desc: Hindi, English, Hinglish, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Punjabi, Odia ‚Äî speak in any language. VoiceTwin learns YOUR voice, not a generic accent.
voicemate.benefit3Desc: Create your first VoiceTwin completely free. No credit card, no trial period, no surprise charges. If you love it, upgrade later for more features. But the core? Always free.
voicemate.benefit4Desc: No complicated software. No studio equipment. Just open HearMe, record for 30 seconds, and your VoiceTwin is ready in 60 seconds. Easier than ordering food online.
voicemate.benefit5Desc: Text messages feel cold. Voice notes take time. VoiceTwin gives you the best of both ‚Äî type fast, but your loved ones hear YOUR voice. The warmth of a call, the convenience of a text.
voicemate.testimonial1Quote: I work night shifts as a nurse. My 5-year-old daughter now hears my voice singing her lullaby every night, even when I'm at the hospital. She sleeps peacefully knowing Maa is always there. VoiceTwin gave me my motherhood back.
voicemate.testimonial2Quote: My parents in Delhi are 70+. I can't call them every day because of time zones. Now I send them voice messages in MY voice ‚Äî 'Good morning Papa, take your medicine' or 'Happy Diwali Maa, I love you.' They play it on repeat. It's like I'm there.
voicemate.testimonial3Quote: My father passed away last year. I had one voice recording of him singing my favorite song. VoiceTwin helped me preserve it. Now my kids can hear their grandfather's voice. It's the most precious gift I could give them.
voicemate.faq1Answer: Yes! Creating your first VoiceTwin is 100% free, forever. No credit card needed. If you want advanced features (multiple voices, higher quality), we offer premium plans starting at ‚Çπ99/month. But the basic VoiceTwin? Always free.
voicemate.faq2Question: How long does it take to create a VoiceTwin?
voicemate.faq2Answer: 60 seconds. Record for 30 seconds, AI processes for 30 seconds. That's it.
voicemate.faq3Question: Can I use VoiceTwin in Hindi or other Indian languages?
voicemate.faq3Answer: Absolutely! VoiceTwin works in Hindi, English, Hinglish, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Punjabi, Odia, and more. Speak in your mother tongue ‚Äî VoiceTwin learns YOUR voice, not a generic accent.
voicemate.faq4Answer: Yes. We use military-grade encryption (same as banks). Your voice is stored securely, never sold to advertisers, and you can delete it anytime.
voicemate.faq5Answer: Yes! You own your VoiceTwin. Delete it anytime with one click. No questions asked.
voicemate.faq6Question: What if I don't like how it sounds?
voicemate.faq6Answer: You can re-record as many times as you want. Try different tones, speeds, or environments until it sounds perfect.
voicemate.faq7Question: Can I create VoiceTwins for my family members?
voicemate.faq7Answer: Yes! Record your child's voice, your spouse's voice, or your parent's voice (with their permission). Preserve family voices for generations.
